thread.title: 11 Unforgettable Lessons Steve Jobs Taught Us
thread.title_full: 11 Unforgettable Lessons Steve Jobs Taught Us

author: Lorenzo Ligato
title: 11 Unforgettable Lessons Steve Jobs Taught Us
text:
11 Unforgettable Lessons Steve Jobs Taught Us "Stay hungry. Stay foolish." Lorenzo Ligato Editorial Fellow, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/05/2015 11:01 AM EDT 
Steve Jobs died exactly four years ago, on Oct. 5, 2011. 
Today, the legacy of the iconic Apple co-founder continues to capture the minds of millions of people, in the tech industry and beyond. His life story will hit the big screen later this month in the biographical movie " Steve Jobs ." 
Undoubtedly, our collective fascination with Jobs is fueled not just by the products he helped create -- iPod, iPhone, iPad -- but by the things he said. Many of his best-known quotes, which come from magazine interviews or from his 2005 commencement speech at Stanford University, encapsulate Jobs' unique mix of entrepreneurial brilliance, visionary spirit and practical wisdom. 
To commemorate the anniversary of Jobs' death, we selected 11 of his most inspiring quotes: Getty Images
